mapper.sql: v.spec_value_id, v.spec_id, v.spec_value, v.spec_image, v.spec_order, v.spec_type, v.inherent_or_add, v.data_stat, v.remarks, v.create_user, v.update_user, v.create_time, v.update_time, v.lock_version
mapper.select:
select , s.spec_name as specName from
left join tb_ecom_specification s on s.spec_id = v.spec_id where v.data_stat='0'
and s.spec_id = #{specId}
and s.spec_name like "%"#{specName}"%"
and v.spec_value like "%"#{specValue}"%"
order by v.create_time desc
